content:
alexcrichton opened PR #11567 from alexcrichton:skip-long-miri-test to bytecodealliance:main:

According to a [recent log] this took 30 minutes to execute in Miri so skip the test on Miri.

[recent log]: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/actions/runs/17312769413/job/49149879051

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.

cfallin submitted PR review:

Thanks and sorry about that -- forgot to exclude it!

alexcrichton commented on PR #11567:

Oh no worries I only figure these things out after the fact too!
